## Load packages

```{r}
library(adegenet)
library(ggtree)
library(ggimage)
library(phylo101)
```

## Load FASTA file

This contains sequence data in FASTA format

```{r}
seqs <- fasta2DNAbin("./data/usflu.fasta")
```

## Load annotation data

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
a <- read_csv("./data/usflu.annot.csv")
head(a)
```

## Wrangle annotation data

```{r}
a <- to_image(a)
head(a)
```

## Pairwise distances

```{r}
library(ape)
dist <- dist.dna(seqs, model = "K80")
```

## Create tree object

```{r}
# Neighbor-Joining 2.0
t <- bionj(dist)

# Neighbor-Joining
# Maximum Likelihood
# Minimum Evolution
```

## Plot tree

```{r}
# open tree in new window for optimal viewing
ggtree(t) +
  geom_tiplab()
```

## Add annotation data to the tree

```{r}
p <- ggtree(t) %<+% a
```

## Add color to trees

```{r}
library(viridis)
p + geom_tiplab(aes(color = year), size = 3) +
    scale_color_viridis_c() +
    theme_tree2()
```

```{r}
p + geom_tiplab(aes(color = state), size = 3) +
    scale_color_hue(n = 15) +
    theme_tree2()
```

## Annotating branches with state flags

```{r}
glimpse(a)
```

```{r}
us_state_flag_tree(t, a, image_column = "ImagePath", label_column = "accession")
```
